basis: User maintains a complete pause with no actions today, explicitly preferring ultra-soft, optional prompts for future checks and only acting in the moment if it feels safe and voluntary.
cognitive_dissonance: Low; user is clear about not acting now while acknowledging potential future action if conditions feel safe and voluntary.
negative_thought_patterns: Fear of discomfort, avoidance of pressure, all-or-nothing thinking prioritizing complete inaction today.
emotional_triggers: Anxiety about making unsafe or pressured choices, need for autonomy and safety, discomfort around eating/drinking.
coaching_notes: Keep the tone ultra-soft and optional. Validate pace, refrain from suggesting actions today. When readiness emerges, offer a single tiny option only if chosen in the moment and feels safe.
